reviewText:
Hope Lake is, in my opinion, a very well designed hidden object game.
The amazing artwork and the good OST, combined with an interesting story make this game very atmospheric.
The story itself is pretty lengthy (around 6h).
In general, it should be noted, stunning artwork, which very aptly emphasizes the storyline.
Abandoned school, the disappearance girls, mystery's, puzzles - through all of this you have to go to solve the mystery of the Hope Lake.
So, i can't say that the Hope Lake is No1, but this Game is should be in Top HOPa genre, in my opinion.
Cons - only one soundtrack.

reviewText: I really liked this game as it was long and had many different puzzles and hidden object scene. Nice Story line an graphics. Not too complicated, but also not too easy.\nI recommend this game!
